text:
Hi all!

Do you guys know if there is any way to set a downloaded theme from the marketplace *not available for new content*?

Or, at least, set a "default" theme to Landing Pages. People from other teams who are responsible for building Landing Pages are messing around with the main theme (and global modules) and now I'm looking for a way to lock down everything before I lose my mind. Any help is appreciated! :confused-parrot:
